snippet.title: Shadows of Doubt (ColePowered Games) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
An immersive sandbox detective stealth game set in a fully simulated sci-fi noir city of crime and corruption. Think like a private investigator and take on jobs to earn cash on your path to catching a serial killer. If you don’t catch them - they will kill again…

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/986130/Shadows_of_Doubt/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------

Six One Indie is an independently operated games organization dedicated to amplifying indie creators of all shapes and sizes.
